page.title: 15Employment In Epworth.
page.content: Not all people from Epworth work in the village.Many go to{Scunthorpe or{Doncaster}which are only a 20 minute drive away and some travel even greater distances.Quite a large proportion do work in Epworth itself. Over{80%}of the Epworth adult population are in full time employment.Even though you may think Epworth is a rural village only about 2%}are{farmers. Local employment varies from{office {secretaries}to{builders}and from {shopkeepers}to{bankers.}There are also many{teachers}living in Epworth and those who work for the{police,fire and{ambulance}services.There is very little industry within the village.The biggest employers in this respect are a{timber merchants}and a firm of {agricultural machinery suppliers}and {engineers.
